snippet: Being fastidious about the basics of cleanliness can reduce the odds of becoming ill while traveling.
abstract: Experts agree that the best thing business travelers can do to reduce their chances of getting sick is to be fastidious about the basics of sanitation in the air and on the ground during their stay.
lead_paragraph: Being fastidious about the basics of cleanliness can reduce the odds of becoming ill while traveling.

headline.seo: Reducing the Odds of Getting Sick on a Trip
headline.main: For Health, Drink Water (but Don’t Drink the Water)
